title: TTHmachine beta2 release (TTF hinting)
content:
I would like to announce the release of TTHmachine Beta 2 (free download).  
It is an IDE, with glyph rendering abilities, for hinting True Type fonts.  
It enables full editing of prep, fpgm, CVT, gasp tables and glyf table instructions.

My thanks to those who have given feedback.

Allan Murray
